sentences.en: Have you been sparring with Helen again?
sentences.cn: 你又一直在与海伦争吵 吗 ?

sentences.en: I think I'm going to stay away from the sparring, man.
sentences.cn: 我不会去跟那些人打对抗的.

sentences.en: The basic rationale of Tai Chi Chuan is unique amongst martial arts and sparring systems.
sentences.cn: 太极拳的基本构想在世界任何拳术、武功、搏击方法中是独一无二的.

sentences.en: The cheerleaders'true sparring partners today are not rock - throwing youths but their fellow intellectuals.
sentences.cn: 现在,拉拉队员真正的辩论对手不是投石攻击的年青人,而是他们的知识分子同仁.
这些斗鸡正在激烈争斗.

sentences.en: The two boys wee sparring and John tapped George's claret.
sentences.cn: 约翰和乔治在打架,结果约翰把乔治的鼻子打出血了.

sentences.en: The two MPs were sparring with each other.
sentences.cn: 这两名议员在互相对骂.

sentences.en: They are all sparring with each other when they gather together.
sentences.cn: 他们一凑到一起总是拌嘴.
他们整个晚上都在争吵.

sentences.en: They've been sparring - partners ever since they were at school together.
sentences.cn: 他俩从一块儿读书起就没停过斗嘴.

sentences.en: We were sparring around to see who was going to take her in first.
sentences.cn: 为了谁先收养她这个问题,我们吵来吵去得不出个结果来.

sentences.en: When visiting any town arena, players can now setup sparring matches with their troops.
sentences.cn: 在访问任何城镇舞台上, 球员现在可以安装陪练配合他们的军队.

sentences.en: With a flourish of their spears , the two little performers started sparring with each other.
sentences.cn: 两个小演员拿长枪一比试,就开始对打起来.

sentences.en: With a flourish of their spears , the two men started sparring with each other.
sentences.cn: 两人拿长枪一比试,便打了起来.

words.tran_cn: [矿物] 晶石；圆材（如桅、桁等）；争论；拳斗

trans.tran_cn: （拳击练习中）不用力打( spar的现在分词 )，试击，争论，争吵
